::Deep Blue::
**a figure emerges from a crater, obviously that of a pod.**


I am DEEP BLUE, Or so im called by anyone who knows me.
I stand about 10 feet tall at full height.  In beast mode i stand only 3 
feet tall as an ewok.  As an ewok i have a deep blue fur coat with strong 
muscular legs and arms.  In my other mode I have a huge armor infastructure 
with plasma cannons and rocket launchers, it is painted a deep blue color.  
There are also some wings in back so i can fly.
I have an allegiance to anyone who claims me first, i know nobody on this 
planet.
